metadata.title: CVE-2016-20015 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In the ebuild package through smokeping-2.7.3-r1 for SmokePing on Gentoo, the initscript allows the smokeping user to gain ownership of any file, allowing for the smokeping user to gain root privileges. There is a race condition involving /var/lib/smokeping and chown.

notes.note: rodrigo-zaiden> issue raised from gentoo packaging, debian could not be affected, more checking is nedded.

criterions.comment: smokeping package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
